entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:42 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -40.3°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northeast 20 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
